name: Untitled Race Game
description:
The arena of fierce battles of murderous machines awaits you, will you be able to withstand a horde of enemies.

You control a machine that possesses an outstanding cannon that will destroy all enemies.

With the help of your driving skills and aimed shooting, you must blow up everyone who crosses your road to shreds

Control:                                                                                                                                                                Controlling WASD (movement) and LMB (shooting)
